description: The Windows Update utility is a built-in tool in both Windows 10 and Windows 11 that allows users to download and install critical updates, including security patches. By navigating to 'Settings', then 'Update & Security', users can check for updates, view their installation status, and manage their update history. Regular use of this utility helps ensure that systems are protected against vulnerabilities, such as CVE-2023-36017, by applying the latest security updates.
